lines.text: Thelma, my poor feet. Where do you suppose we are now? Walked far enough to have been back in Joplin.

Oh my, I'm awful sorry, but my skirt got caught in the door and, you know, when you closed the door in such a hurry. It's my new skirt too! My mother just sent it to me from Joplin, Its awfully stretchy... do you want to feel?
Those dad burned city critters. I wish they were men for a couple of seconds, I'd fix 'em.
The matter? Ha! Them womens back again.
Oh, it's that silly duck again!
